hotels.title: Urban Japan Retreat near Matsuyama Castle
hotels.description: In the heart of the city, ANA Crowne Plaza Matsuyama, an IHG Hotel, sits at the feet of the imposing and beautiful Matsuyama Castle. Its central location allows for rapid access to the entrance of this iconic landmark's gardens, only a short five-minute walk away. On your return, savour delectable cuisine at the multiple restaurants onsite or observe stunning sunsets at the Sky Lounge as you relish a refined refreshment or warming whiskey from great heights.
